snippet: Christine C. Quinn’s father was poised to play a starring role in her campaign this summer, but several ailments have kept him off the trail.
abstract: Trailside blog; New York City Council Speaker Christine C Quinn’s father was poised to play a starring role in her mayoral campaign but ailments have kept him off the trail; campaign is instead set to create a Twitter account for the famously opinionated, if technologically challenged, Lawrence Quinn.
lead_paragraph: Christine C. Quinn’s father was poised to play a starring role in her campaign this summer, but several ailments have kept him off the trail.
